message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $60.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $60 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to pay $70 for the product. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. What do you think?
